title: 20 Feet From Stardom
description: Winner of the 2014 Academy Award for Best Documentary Feature, this film takes a look at the world of backup vocalists and the legends they support.
actors: Darlene Love, Merry Clayton, Lisa Fischer, Táta Vega

title: 25 to Life
description: A young black man who has kept his HIV status secret for 25 years encounters heartache and joy as he reveals the hard truth to family and friends.

title: 27: Gone Too Soon
description: Explore the circumstances surrounding the tragic deaths at 27 of Jimi Hendrix, Jim Morrison, Brian Jones, Janis Joplin, Kurt Cobain and Amy Winehouse.
actors: Janis Joplin, Jimi Hendrix, Amy Winehouse, Jim Morrison
